title: Monsters Are Just Like Us
description:
'Monsters Are Just Like Us'

Action Lab Entertainment, 2009, 40 pages

Written and Illustrated by John 'Super Ugly' Williams

Part storybook, part over-sized art book, artist extraordinaire Super Ugly debunks everything you've learned about the things that go bump in the night. It turns out that monsters have to contend with everyday mundane tasks, too. From picking up dog poop to watering the lawn, monsters truly are just like us!
